overview: A Taste of Joy shows hot and innovative porn from a female perspective: the chemistry is real, the man the object of desire and the focus is on female pleasure. This film is a collection of classic and brand-new scenes that express Petra’s vision of joyful, alternative porn. These five explicit scenes show why Petra’s multi-award-winning films have become cult viewing: the sex is creative and exciting and the production value high. The release of this film coincided with the publication of Petra’s autobiographic book The She Pornographer in Germany. One highlight of this film collection is the explicit documentary The Joy of Porn that offers glimpses behind the scenes at Petra’s shoot and celebrates the female revolution of the porn industry.
title: A Taste of Joy
